entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Beaverlodge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:57 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -25.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Beaverlodge 03:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -25.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Dewpoint: -29.3°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:09 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:09 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:09 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
